summary: The module defines a class that represents a distributed array of strings stored on the Arkouda server. It uses offset and byte arrays to manage string data efficiently and provides a Pythonic sequence interface. The class offers extensive string manipulation capabilities, including searching, matching, replacing, splitting, case conversion, trimming, and regex operations with caching. It also supports conversion to/from native Python/NumPy structures and serialization to storage formats like HDF5 and Parquet.
business_intent: Enable large‑scale, server‑side string processing within the Arkouda framework, allowing users to perform complex text analytics on massive datasets without transferring data to the client.
